about_the_game:
Welcome, Star Striker. You have been chosen. Lead your team in a tournament, where the prize is the future of your own planet!

Clash of the Captains



8 best players from 8 different planets will face each other in the biggest tournament of them all. Each with different powers. Each with their own team of robo players. Which one will you become?

Lead a team as an electrifying techno-cat. Face hot-blooded Vikings from an ice planet. Team up with the mighty molluscs of the Space Ocean. Or play defence with a four-handed goalie. Find the best captain for your tactics!

Unleash the Star Power



Discover Star Powers and enjoy the incredible spectacle that ensues. Learn how to use them to your advantage, and dominate the field. Every character is available in two versions: light and dark. Each comes with different Star Powers and leads to a different ending.

Play Solo or with Friends



Compete in the galactic tournament against the A.I. or invite a friend! Play multiplayer locally or online in exciting 1vs1 matches. Check out the Randomizer Mode for extra modifiers that will spice up your experience!

Features


  • Thrilling, lightning-fast matches of galactic soccer
  • Single-player and local & online multiplayer modes
  • Tournament mode with a story of epic proportions
  • Randomizer Mode with surprising game modifiers
  • 8 unique captains, each in Light and Dark version
  • 16 Star Power abilities for tactical use
  • Beautiful hand-drawn visuals
detailed_description:
Welcome, Star Striker. You have been chosen. Lead your team in a tournament, where the prize is the future of your own planet!

Clash of the Captains



8 best players from 8 different planets will face each other in the biggest tournament of them all. Each with different powers. Each with their own team of robo players. Which one will you become?

Lead a team as an electrifying techno-cat. Face hot-blooded Vikings from an ice planet. Team up with the mighty molluscs of the Space Ocean. Or play defence with a four-handed goalie. Find the best captain for your tactics!

Unleash the Star Power



Discover Star Powers and enjoy the incredible spectacle that ensues. Learn how to use them to your advantage, and dominate the field. Every character is available in two versions: light and dark. Each comes with different Star Powers and leads to a different ending.

Play Solo or with Friends



Compete in the galactic tournament against the A.I. or invite a friend! Play multiplayer locally or online in exciting 1vs1 matches. Check out the Randomizer Mode for extra modifiers that will spice up your experience!

Features

  • Tournament mode with a story of epic proportions

name: Star Strikers: Galactic Soccer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Star Strikers: Galactic Soccer is a beautiful hand-drawn arcade football game, with fast-paced action, unique playfields and crazy characters from all over the universe! Great in single-player, even better with friends.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
